```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

Import the `FAS_litters.csv` csv using a relative path

```{r}
litters_df =
  read_csv("data/FAS_litters.csv")

litters_df = 
  janitor::clean_names(litters_df)
```
Import the `FAS_pups.csv` csv using a relative path
```{r}
pups_df =
  read_csv("data/FAS_pups.csv")

pups_df = 
  janitor::clean_names(pups_df)
```
Import the `FAS_pups.csv` csv using an absolute path
```{r, eval = FALSE}
pups_df_abs =
  read_csv("~/Desktop/data_wranging_i/data/FAS_pups.csv")

pups_df = 
  janitor::clean_names(pups_df)
```

## Look at data
```{r}
litters_df
head(litters_df)
tail(litters_df)
```
you can use `view`
```{r, eval = FALSE}
view(litters_df)
```
Look at data summary
```{r}
str(litters_df)
skimr::skim(litters_df)
```
